To serve: bowl of rice, cooked according to packet instructions

steps: Heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan over a high heat. Add the turkey and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
Add the leeks and garlic to the pan for 2-3 minutes.
Add the remaining ingredients simmer to reduce and thicken the sauce.
To serve, remove the sauce from pan and eat alone or with a bowl of steaming rice.
title: Turkey ragù
